article_title: Grimes gives McConnell ammunition with Michelle Obama fundraiser
article_text: Alison Lundergan Grimes joined other female U.S. Senate candidates and first lady Michelle Obama on Monday for a Democratic Senatorial Campaign Committee fundraiser in New York.
